评论详情: As a women who is 6' with 34 DDD's I was ecstatic when I tried this on and it fit like a glove. It's long enough to fully fit the torso and doesn't have that weird gap under the bust, it curves to your body and is long enough in the clasp area that your lady parts are not being m*rdered. It's double lined in the bust area as well so for those that would want to go braless it seems like it would give good coverage and keeps the cherries where they need to be. I put like 6 other colors on my wishlist 😂
The bottom of this bodysuit is not thong. It is a regular high-cut brief bottom.

I absolutely love this bodysuit! The fabric is soft and stretchy, and it fits perfectly. The snap closure makes it super convenient, and it looks great paired with jeans or skirts. It’s flattering, comfortable, and holds up well after washing. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a stylish and versatile piece!
I bought white and black. For what it is, I was not disappointed. It definitely has a band to support your midsection a bit and the style is gray under cardigans and blazers.
Have in so many colors!!! Fit true to size!

This is a great shirt, however it is so thin that you can see EVERYTHING! I don’t mean that it is see through, but more so that you can see the lines of your bra, even if you just wear little stickies, you can see the outline of them as well. Tricky to wear this shirt.
I love this body suit. Buttery smooth. Comfy. And helps make you feel thin 😆 you can dress up with it however and looks good.
Nice color and material quality, but received size S instead of M ordered.
My item arrived filthy!! It's covered in black marks and what looks like deodorant all over it. Sending back asap. No one looks before repacking obviously. Disgusting

评论概述: Sizing is not the same as when previously purchased
评论详情: I bought the purple bodysuit about a year ago, size small, and it fits perfectly. I ordered two more - in black and a wine color. The pieces that snap in the crotch are so long (as seen in photo) that they just dangle and don’t fit like a bodysuit. I will be returning the two new ones.

I am so impressed with this sleeveless bodysuit! It fits like a glove and is incredibly comfortable to wear. The material is soft, stretchy, and breathable, making it perfect for all-day wear or as a base layer under other outfits. The design is sleek and flattering, hugging my curves in all the right places without feeling tight or restrictive. I love that the sleeveless style gives it a chic, modern look, and the snap closure at the bottom makes it easy to wear without worrying about shifting or discomfort. It’s versatile too—I can dress it up with a skirt or keep it casual with jeans. Whether I'm layering it or wearing it solo, it always looks amazing. Definitely a wardrobe essential!

评论概述: Super soft fabric, very vibrant colors
评论详情: I really like this shirt and the fit. I would size up if I buy again just because it's very tight and form fitting. I needed to add bra pads and they stayed in place very well.
I like it. Very nice💕
I have a bigger bust and this keeps them nice and snug. The size is perfect. The cut is great and it has snaps so I can pee without getting naked. I love this!
I used the measurements provided, but it was still way too big. Very disappointed.
Love this top. Fits my shape nicely. I'm 5' 5-1/2" and 138 lbs and ordered a medium. I pair this with a work blazer and get lots of compliments. I am going to order more colors!
The bodysuit I received was already worn. It had deodorant stains as seen in the pictures I provided. The return process was difficult and inconvenient.

I went out with my girlfriends and got compliments from all of them! One even asked for the link and purchased one on the spot!!! This body suit is super flattering and I feel extremely supported and comfortable. It is a buttery soft material and not see through in the slightest. I’m a big fan and have it in black and a mustard yellow color. I plan to invest in more as they are great on their own or layered.

评论概述: These are so different to how they used to be
评论详情: I probably own 20 of these tops in different colors. I just bought a top to replace my worn out old one. As soon as I opened the packaging I could tell.it was different. The fabric is super cheap and the stitching is terrible. Even the label seems cheaper. I'm really disappointed as these tops were really a staple in my wardrobe.

This shirt fits great and is made of a soft, smooth material that isn’t see-through. I haven’t had any issues washing it, and I always hang it to dry. I would definitely buy more of these! It’s a great shirt for a decent price!
Super fitting, good material, double  layered for extra support. My favorite go to… I have 5 colors

This was an odd fit all together. It’s a double layer but you can see the line of the second layer comes above my bellybutton and it’s super noticeable. As well as very high. I wouldn’t call my jeans low and you can see how high they come up in my hips. This also smashes my bust and made it look like a sports bra. Not very flattering. Retuned.
Doesn’t hold shape. Cheap and ill fitted. Do not recommend

评论概述: Creases that I can’t get out on the front
评论详情: I didn’t open this until later so I can’t return. But after washing a couple times to see if they would come out, there are permanent creases in the front that will not come out. It is on the upper portion on the chest so it is very noticeable. This is preventing me from wearing this😭
Definitely worth it!
Very thick material ( double lining ), the color is exactly what you see .
The material is excellent quality, very durable and comfy. Excellent value for price.
It was a perfect outfit for the ocassion. True to size. Super comfortable.

评论概述: Terrible quality, weirdly lined, horribly absorbent
评论详情: I only wore this once and within two hours knew it was going in the trash. The feel and quality are atrocious and the snap closure is done backwards, so that the snaps are inside and irritate you. Worse, I’m not a very sweaty person but it’s so absorbent that I had four inch long lines of sweat just under my boobs within two hours of wearing it, in 65 degree weather. The top is also only partially lined, with the liner extending about a third of the way down from the neckline. In the medium size on my DD chest this very visible line hit in the worst possible spot. The liner is only attached on the top and side seams so this issue may have been anticipated but wasn’t fixed.  I will never wear it again and it was a waste of money.
Nice material, thick enough to not be self-conscious.
love this for summer time! the color is so bright and the fit is great!

This is a good basic for layering. I love how soft it is and that it’s double lined. The only reasons it’s not getting 5 stars is because some of the colors in the product pictures are a bit misleading. One other note is that I also bought these for my sister. I got her a large and the body suit was VERY long on her. She’s 5’2”. I’m also 5’2” and the small fits me fine. The larger sizes might be too long if you’re on the shorter side
This is one of my favorite staple pieces in my closet. I love it so much that I now have it in three different colors now. Works great with jeans, jumpsuit, and fun to layer!
I bought this last month for $14.98. Today “prime day deals” for october has it marked down to…. $14.98 from apparently $36. it’s always been $14.98. it’s good materiel and comfy. but not a deal.

This is the ONLY bodysuit I’ve ever felt comfortable in. It’s not see through and it holds in well. It is a thong, which I don’t mind? But I don’t remember reading that. I ordered the large. I’m 5’6 and about 165 in this pic with a 34DD chest. I have it in black too. Highly recommend!!
I was skeptical but it's very cute in person, really nice feel and fit to it
I am always worried for showing my embarrassing arm fat and this is smooth and barely so it
This is my second time purchasing, as i spilled coffee (ugh) on the 1st. Very soft and stretchy with a little bit of 'hold' without feeling tight.
This is a well fitting top that's a perfect layer going into fall for pullovers or flannels.
Runs small. The fabric is nice, it’s thick but also has a silky feel to it
Great value for price.  Comfortable. Great fit. Washes up nice. I have the black and white.  I’m ordering more colors.
Love these! Purchased in every color. True to size and shaping.

Very cute bodysuit, great vibrant color (green), fits perfectly in every part of the body. Front has double fabric so there's more coverage. Quality comparable to the leading brand. Highly recommended!

I absolutely love this. With the extra layer around the chest, a bra isn’t required which is always a plus. The rust orange is so lovely. I’m so pleased and will likely be purchasing in other colors!!

Wish the double layer went all the way down but not a deal breaker.  Can be worn without a bra and is not see through or can be paired with a bra if you’re not comfortable.  I have a few different bodysuits from this brand and love them all.  Super cute and can be paired with lots of different bottoms.  Highly recommend!

The fabric is buttery soft! The fabric is breathable but still thick enough not to be see-through. It has the perfect amount of stretch. I've washed it a couple of times now, and it's still in perfect condition. Highly recommend it!
I love the material of this top it exceeding my expectations. Definitely good for the price point! Don’t hesitate just get it :)
I like it long thong that snaps .
Green body suit is super cute and comfortable to wear. Highly recommend

The quality has changed since my first purchase back in 2021. I had to return 3 of them because the fabric is too thin. I really should haven't waited to order more. But I have ten different colors of the original bodysuit.

I have a few of these in different colors and LOVE them. Only thing with the white is it does have an extra layer underneath so it isn’t see thru, but it’s not connected to the bottom so you can see it and it rolls up at times.
Very soft, breathable and super comfy.
Great fit, fabric, comfortable, durable, value for money. I want wveey single colour.
Loved it
This was very flattering for my curvy body! So cute and the color is remarkable!

评论概述: Love it, Going to order more!
评论详情: This may be my new favorite body suit! It's comfortable and breathable. Easy to clasp (if you know you know) and doesn't move or irritate you.

I’ve ordered this in various colors and not had a problem before . This one took way longer than normal to arrive (by weeks not days). It also was not the same material and I’m pretty sure not the same manufacturer when it arrived. It was misshapen and not stretchy. Beware of this color. Maybe.
Feels like a swimsuit the uncomfortable kind

评论概述: I love these bodysuits except for one thing….
评论详情: The quality is really nice and the length of the bodysuit is perfect for me. BUT…. The one thing I don’t like is the second layer on the inside of the bodysuit isn’t long enough. It seems like it was made for people to wear only high waisted bottoms with. For that reason… it gets a 4 star review. It fits very nicely and snug but not too tight at all. Not for tummy control. I love high neck. Super cute. This was my first bodysuit purchase and it’s been better than the ones I have now found in the store. Good value for the cost
Great coverage if you are lucky enough to be able to go braless but looks amazing either way! I am buying them all!
Great fitting top. Super versatile. At first I wasn’t sure about the fabric because it felt kinda thick but wore it to a summer concert and was comfy all night.
Thick enough to net need a bra!!!  Hooray. Fabric is on par with Athleta or lulu at a fraction of the cost. I have several tanks and bodysuits from this brand.

Why is no one talking about how weird the sizing is. I bought the green and the nude color.. the thong is too long, unless you have a long torso it will be loose from the bottom!! and around the underarms , front area, there is a gap [ like you can fit 3 fingers in there] i would not buy again.. ill stick to the other brands on amazon
Not flattering.  Got size L based on reviews. Squished my chest flat but still puckered and looked too big in armpits.

评论概述: Not sure where it came from.
评论详情: I ordered one in pink and absolutely loved everything about it. Then I ordered one in purple and also white. I love the quality of this brand. Reoria never disappoints. This body suit material is buttery soft and is double lined so a bra isn’t necessary. The quality is high and feels luxurious without the hefty price tag. Will definitely be purchasing again!
I was a little worried about this, but once I got it and tried it on I was happy with the quality, comfort and material.
Bonito

This is such a soft and comfy bodysuit! I would 100% buy it again in other colours  The only draw back is it’s not a “bra less” bodysuit. The nips defo still show through a bit and you probably need some more support to lift the girls up! It’s still a 9/10 for sure

I bought this months ago and I still love it! I get so many compliments on it and I get asked where its from all the time. This was actually my first body suit and now I'm hooked! I don't know what took me so long to get them. This one fits true to size and so versatile. You can't really wear a regular bra with it, without the straps showing. I haven't had any issues with my bra showing underneath so it is not see through. Would recommend!

Color is wonderful! I wish they would come out with different cuts with this color. Easy to wash. Snaps well and is comfortable. Love the double lining so shapes the body very well and great quality material.
I really like the color of this product. It's very cute.
Great great one piece snap bottom cute top.  The color is very blush purple and smooth material. Price point is decent for this item.
I buy this every time I need a staple bodysuit. The colors are rich and the texture is amazing. Definitely one of my favorites.
Returned it. As most of the other reviews mentioned- it fits weird around the armpit area. It sticks out and makes it look weird and cheap.
I bought this top in black. Loved it so much I had to have one in white. The material is so soft.

This sleeveless racerback halter neck bodysuit is a wardrobe essential! The fit is flattering and comfortable, with a sexy and streamlined design that works well for both casual and dressy occasions. The material is soft and stretchy, providing a great shape without feeling restrictive. It pairs effortlessly with skirts or jeans and is easy to layer under jackets. If you’re looking for a versatile and chic bodysuit, this one is a fantastic choice!

Love this! I really like how this looks. I’m 5’7 & 159 lbs. I purchased a medium and it fits perfect. Not tight at all. The double layer at the top is nice so I don’t have to wear a bra if I don’t want to…let’s be real who wants to lol

The color was extraordinarily bright. I wanted bring but not that bright. Returned.

评论概述: Slimming effect. Don’t need a bra
评论详情: Material is great !

I was so excited to get this color top, it really looks beautiful. Unfortunately, the body does not lay flat against that body when it comes to the arm/shoulder hole, there is a gaping in the front that is really unpleasant as if it doesn't fit properly and it has nothing to do with filling out the chest area, I'm a 32 dd. I am a medium and I don't think it is a matter of sizing down it just looks a little disproportional and you can even see it in the other reviews with pictures. So I'm bummed that the body doesn't lay flat, I think I need to take it in under the armpit or just live with it gaping a bit. It looks like they made room for armpit boob spillage... but who wants/needs that highlighted.
Very soft & pretty color, but had to return because it was so tiny. Ordered a medium and I couldn't even get it on my body. Ended up returning.

This bodysuit has a wierd cut out in the chest area. I wear a 34C and it leaves extra room around the neck/chest area so that there is a little flap that doesn't ever go down or I have to constantly readjust my chest so that it doesn't look wierd. The white color will show everything. You can definitely see my nip shape through it, so if it's cold, everyone will know. Also, it shows every roll on your body, so that if you aren't in perfect shape, everyone will know. Lastly, the material is not the best. However, the thong is comfortable. I do not recommend this piece though.

This brand is so nice! Double lined, good material and very versatile. I have 3 different colors so far in the same cut. Wash on casual, could also put in a garment bag, and air dry. I wear a small and it fits perfectly. I’m 5’2, 123lbs with D breasts.

Okay! So I am 5’4”, 185lbs, usually size large. And for extra info I’m a 38C.  I got a size large in black and this thing fits so much better than I was expecting! I went back and forth on a size and settled with large, and it fits great! Also, interestingly enough, didn’t have a bra on when I tried it on and the boobs looked FINE. No bra necessary, which is so nice for thicker girls because bra lines can just be annoying.  The crotch area is a little thick, I can def feel it but it’s not the worst. Thong style in the back so hope you’re ready for that. The material is breathable and stretchy but a STRONG stretchy. It isn’t thin if flimsy by any means.  All in all 11/10, get it.
I didn’t utilize this item however I’m sure it’s as described

This feels so buttery soft! I want to order more! It is double-lined but you can still see the nips when cold. Ill have to order nipple covers, but I don’t care, I love this so much and I don’t want to wear a bra with it, because lets be real, who does! This color is vibrant and fun and great on darker skin tones. For reference, I got my normal size Medium, 5’1, 144-146 lbs. Curvy with a legit mom pouch. Haven’t fully lost the baby weight, but trying. I am a 36DD and I will say the material does lift a little on the side boob area (see pic).

Last summer I bought this in black, hot pink, and white (I was getting married), and they are HANDS down the best bodysuits. I just bought another black one. Easy to wash. The colors stay and don’t fade. Great value!!

This did not fit me the way it look in the picture and it has no spandex or waist cinching material in it. Literally is just a regular top that can cute with denim
Very comfortable to wear! I loved it so much I got three all in a size large
Great quality!! Thick white double lined slick fabric, 5'4 and 117 small was a perfect fit.
I love the material. Great buy. I want more in different colors

most bodysuits are either not long enough for my body, or just fit too tight, and I do not have a long torso. this bodysuit is amazing!! does not ride up. comes in so many fun colors! i ordered the coffee color and definitely will be getting more from this brand.

评论概述: Material reminds me of swim suit
评论详情: This was awful. Material reminds me of a wetsuit or bathing suit material and extremely thick. Felt like I was in a seal suit. Besides material. I am 5'0, torso is shorter and I had way to much extra material towards the bottom. I ordered black in size small.

The material and cut are attractive. However, it was shipped in a vacuum-sealed pouch which caused deep wrinkles. I thought that washing might help remove the wrinkles, but it did not. All of my pictures are after washing. I wore it with an athletic skirt, but I wouldn’t wear it for anything beyond that. Wouldn’t really recommend.
I wore it to our trip to Cancun. Luv it so colorful and comfortable. I also bought a bright orange too.
